author: julianfoad
msg: (get_log): Correct the perldoc for the $paths parameter, which
must be '' not '/' to indicate 'all paths'.

msg: Remove branch serf_stream_commit for now. I'll recreate it later from trunk

author: hwright
msg: First part of 'blame -g' rework.  Instead of commingling the merged and
mainline revisions, uncommingle them into separate lists, and mingle them when
This completely breaks 'blame -g' functionality but...it's been broken
for the last few weeks anyway, and the appropriate tests are already
marked XFail.  This lays the groundwork for a fix to the problem.
(svn_repos_get_file_revs2): Implement a 2-step process for finding the
(find_interesting_revisions): Don't mark revisions as merged or not.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix syntax errors in RelaxNG schema files for svn output.
The second 'target' declaration should be named 'changelist'.
The text was doubled, for some reason.
Add a missing declaration for the <diff> element.

author: julianfoad
msg: (svn_xml_parse): Make the integer type match the string format specifier
